title: Firewall problem - Again happening since new patch
body: Firewall issues when loading into a game has started again since patch -_-

replies.body:
Hey Maximum Spice,

Apologies for the late response. Are you still encountering connection issues? If so, please try the steps in the troubleshooting guide, linked below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
